ingredients.ingredient: 1 (10 ounce) can chile sauce without beans
4 tablespoons prepared yellow mustard, or to taste

cookingTips: Warm chile sauce separately to concentrate flavors rather than heating in the same pan as hot dogs
Toast hot dog buns lightly for better texture and to prevent sogginess
Serve with diced onion on the side so diners can customize to taste
enrichment.coachingPrompt: Coney dogs are a Detroit staple with specific traditions. Are you familiar with the regional style, and would you like guidance on sourcing authentic chile sauce or tips for assembly?
